Review Headline: Easy site to order from, excellent service
Review Comments: Easy site to order from, excellent service

Product fine and as requested, but delivery was by parcel force. A card was left indicating the parcel had been taken to a local post office. There was no option given on the card to arrange redelivery. The post office in question was not my regular sorting office with extended Christmas collection opening hours but was a post office counter in a local convenience store. There was no indication on the card re opening times of the post office in question, and no indication on the card of how long they kept the parcel for. I Googled the opening hours of the store, but was unsure if I could only collect when the post office counter was open (the hours for which were not on the store website) or during the extended hours of the linked store. As no-one answered the phone in the named post office when I tried to enquire, and because I inferred collection only when the counter was open was more likely (and didn't want to make a wasted journey), and because I do not drive, it was over a week before I could get there to collect my parcel, and this was inconvenient in relation to my work commitments necessitating taking a taxi to work after collecting the parcel. I have never had a parcel end up in a local post office counter in this way before. This was very inconvenient and time consuming, and I would be cautious about ordering from Wex again for this reason.

Review Headline: Monfrotto macro/ still life tabletop Flash light set
Review Comments: Delivery drivers, first attempt to deliver, he could not locate my address, as I had paid for next day I am not impressed as I didn't received my parcel on time. Contacted Amazon via Online then your return phone call. I was asked for any information that could help the driver locate me, explained that my block of flats are at the very end of the Cul de Sac and gave you my permission to give driver my mobile number. The next day I received a call from your driver, he was in my road but still unable to find my block of flats. Talking to him on the phone, he could not understand ENGLISH, so in the end I had to rush outside and up the road to find him, he had not driven or walked to the very end of the road, where in fact their is a large Sign with the Block of Flats Name on it. I am not impressed with your choice of employee, as he seemed unable to understand simple instructions. I would appreciate a reply at your earliest convenience.

I pre-ordered a camera with an 'offer' pack that came free. There was no hurry but when I found the camera was being sold [ie; in stock] and asked why my order had not been despatched?  When I called staff were very helpful and split the order so that I could get used to using the camera and the 'offer pack' was sent some time later. Within that pack an item was an issue, 'Adobe Cloud Membership', and I've effectively been left to sort the problem out with Canon. I appreciate that items within a 'pack' may not directly be the responsibility of Wex but I do feel a bit let down. Other outlets were offering the same deal but I stuck to Wex as I've had previous good experience but this may change that loyalty. I think that Wex is a good company but on this occasion they could have done better

It would have been helpful to know via the information that's on the website that it takes approximately 10 cubic feet of bean bag beans to fill the bean bag (it states this on the leaflet in the packaging, but not on the website!). Great product though, although some of the beans have leaked so I would have preferred it to come with an inner bag (I may now have to purchase 1, empty the bean bag and refill it!) Filling the bean bag also isn't the easiest task and took 2 of us. However all that aside it's a great size for newborn photography, even made a 9lb4 baby look small! Also holds the blankets used to cover it well without slipping too much, and used on a wood floor with no problems with it sliding about or anything. So overall I'm happy!

Product was as expected. ordering from WEX was excellent, unfortunately tracked my parcel via Royal mail and watched it been loaded on van, only to be returned in van without even attempted delivery. Then watched it  over the weekend sat in the Royal Mail depot. Eventually got the product 5 days after dispatch from WEX. Admittedly 2 of those days were the weekend and my delivery was free. When It go delivered, driver told me that a lot of parcels go back to the depot because they are loaded with too many deliveries to do in one day. Not WEX fault and it was delivered within WEX 3-5 working days, but it's frustrating to see your parcel loaded on a van and you wait in all day thinking it will arrive, only to see it go back to the depot.
Great service arrived when promised would not hesitate to use them again

Review Headline: Brilliant service. Let down by manufacturer's procedure.
Review Comments: The seller was great. I bought a DJI Inspire 2 with accessory kit - a not insignificant amount of money. Found that the DJI Intelligent Flight Battery (£190-worth!) supplied was faulty. Had ordered to ""play with"" over the bank holiday weekend so sat and looked at it instead! I rang WEX and had great customer service but they are unable to send me out a new battery until the supplied one is returned, inspected by DJI and agreed that it does not work, and authorise another to be sent. So still unable to use the product. Having spent so much I would have hoped there could be a better system for this allowing the customer to use the new product they have got. Hence a star dropped.
Took a bit of time before someone would actually look at the item I was interested in  that enabled me to make a decision and purchase the item .

As a supplier of quality photographic equipment, shipping wasn't that great, you need to rethink who should you use to move your client's orders. I was promised the goods on Friday, Parcel Force didn't care, even though your company made additional enquires on my behalf.  Received goods on following Monday afternoon, had to explain what happened, to organise a reshoot date with my client.What was promised by Parcel Force fell on deaf ears, there was on recollection or anything noted down by Parcel Force, orders to be actioned on behalf of Wex Photograhics. I recommend you immediately change your forwarding and sending provider, Parcel Force.

Experience good. Website good. In-store experience when I visited a month ago was excellent.   I can tell you a flaw in your website that you should inform your developers about.   Often when someone copies a voucher code (or other number etc.) into a web field there is a space also copied immediately after it. Your site produces an error when there's a blank space entered after a code.   I got a site error, had to back one page, and then re-entered carefully deleting the blank. It went through fine.   That is a long explanation - I do computer coding, and all you need to do to explain this to your site developers is:   ""The input field for the voucher code needs to TRIM() the input as generating error if blanks around it. Many people will copy and paste voucher codes, and if copying and pasting from HTML sometimes will have blank after so need to TRIM() to avoid error.""  Had I not understood from programming experience and not corrected that problem I am sure I would still be frustrated as to why the WEX site doesn't work, or can't accept the discount code. Small detail but important. Maybe you occasionally have people call and say the voucher code caused an error? This is your reason.   ...Now that has to be worth a nice shopping token! Really want a fast Nikor Lens!  Have a great day. I am looking forward to my new (second hand) camera I just purchased.   Dan.

Review Headline: 4 Stars is not a failing of WEX, more a failing of the mo...
Review Comments: 4 Stars is not a failing of WEX, more a failing of the modern ways, my 'dislike of internet purchasing', which seems to be the way we're pushed today. As a store, my nearest WEX are brilliant, just too far away and not overly easy to get to because of traffic. I'm not a fan of internet buying, preferring to see and handle my intended purchase before buying, and what other options, which are often available, and chat with knowledgeable staff about how various items work. It's also a good way of teasing me with what stock there is, for I'm always looking.... The overall process was easy, and quick, but impersonal because it lacked the bonus of talking in person to knowledgeable sales staff. Perhaps I'm just too old skool… ;)

Pretty darn easy online experience. Well guided checkout process with good confirmation of security and numerous options for payment methods. Browsing can feel a little clumsy at times if you are going through the ""used"" sections. Plus at times the options for limiting the lenses you can see at one time via focal length is a little annoying with the check-box method. It might be nice to be able to search within a manufacturer of lens-mount via focal length simply by directly typing it in ie. ""Fuji X mount fit -  Focal length 35mm"" . All that said WEX are probably the largest UK online choice for all aspects and levels of photographers from folk wanting a family snapshot camera through those wanting to shoot film all the way to high end pro gear. Such a range would never have been found in a bricks and mortar store even back in the heady days of the late 80's.

A company such as WEX with the vast amount of business it provides should be influential in getting a better service or it can take its business elsewhere.

Service was excellent as usual.  I have shopped at Wex previously; their prices may be higher than some box shifters but are more or less the same as other quality photography outlets. It is easy to order using credit cards and delivery is usually very quick; and for a small extra cost you can get next day delivery.  For a recent order of mine, the next day delivery did not occur - the fault of the delivery firm, not Wex - but Wex refunded the cost of next day delivery without question

Review Comments: VERY EASY TO SEARCH WEBSITE  AND PROCESS ORDER.

The website was easy to use, found what I wanted quickly and purchasing was a breeze. The camera itself is fantastic and couldn't be happier with my purchase. The only reason I gave four and not five stars was due to the execution of the fraud system that I experienced. I placed my order Thursday night and payed for Saturday delivery, I then received an email late Friday morning asking to provide a photo of my driving license or passport, now this email asked for no more details and the only time frame it mentioned was to send back before 7 days, Iuckily I was at home and was able to quickly send a proof of ID, I called to confirm if I would still receive my order by Saturday, I was told that I would if I could also send a proof of address before 18:30 closing. I could not believe this and was just grateful I was at home otherwise I would not have been able to provide what they asked in time and therefore not receiving my order on the day I had paid for it to be delivered. I don't mean to rant but this was inconvenient, I'm not saying to not have safety checks/fraud prevention in place but to reevaluate the current system.

Review Headline: Yes I would buy this product again
Review Comments: This experience was absolutely fine in buying a 5D Mk IV camera and my previous experience was great in that a secondhand cheaper Lee filter case was suggested to me rather than new which saved £20. However my previous two showroom visits have been extremely bad. Firstly the younger guy with the black hair has been very rude twice. I also brought a 7D Mkii but wanted to part exchange a 7D Mki - I was told that the flash didnt work at all over the phone, then told it was intermittent when collecting the unit. I found this strange as I'd never used it and upon getting it home I tried it 75x and each time it worked fine. I can only assume it was an excuse because the camera had a high shutter count. Previously to that I purchased a Sony RX100 II and Sigma 150-600mm S lens and found that i was charged £40 for a two year warranty on the Sony I didnt ask for and didnt want. If it wasn't for the convenience of Wex being local to me then I would shop elsewhere, especially given the rudeness of the assistant.

I love this bag. I've been searching for a camera bag that I can fit my Nikon D5100 with an extra 55-300 lens, plus some backpacking gear and the essential water bottle. I have a smaller bag that fits the camera, but no gear, and a larger bag that is so bulky and heavy, it is not suitable for hikes. This bag is perfect with enough space for extras, including a rain coat and gloves. There are plenty of ways to attach poles or a tripod, and it  comes with its own rain cover. The bag arrived quickly, and the only reason I've given it 4 stars, not 5, is that the security tag is still attached! I don't want to rip the bag removing it, so have just been using it with the tag attached.

Review Headline: Snap a computer bargain at Wex!
Review Comments: Great price on an Apple Thunderbolt 27 inch display. I only associated Wex with Cameras but this display was the best price I could find on the internet and from a reputable supplier. Its not a 5k display but it seems good value for the money for image processing photographs. I decided to replace my 2009 IMAC with this display driven from my 2015 Macbook Pro. The Macbook Pro has a retina display so well suited to this 27inch monitor and the USB 3 interface on the Macbook makes a significant difference to access to my half a Terabyte of RAW images on an external drive.  Note that the Apple Thunderbolt Display only has USB 2 ports - ok for most things but make sure your external USB 3 drive is plugged into the Computer USB ports (if that is USB 3). A good compromise compared to spending £1.9 - 2.3k on a new Imac with 5k display. Wex is only missing the last star for the delivery. The Apple box was in a larger packing box but not marked as Fragile and upon opening, the bubble packing was only protecting one side. The Delivery person moved the display from her van to the door by tipping it end over end down the drive. Not what you want to see happen to a £750 piece of sensitive electronic equipment. No damage is apparent but I await to see if any problems develop from poor delivery handling.

The tripod itself is good, lightweight and easy to transport. Would suit well an amateur or beginner photographer who doesn't want to spend fortunes on their first tripod. The finishes of the plastic tripod head are a bit rough, but it does the job.  I was particular happy with the service provided by WexPhotographic. The standard delivery was extremely quick, I received mine the next working day. However the tripod came faulty, so I had to return in exchange for a new one. Customer services was prompt in response, and I was sent a prepaid return postage label. Got my new and properly working tripod very soon after that. Thanks for the no-fuss service!

Easy shopping. Disappointed that the full multi pack of inks is not offered anymore as buying the current multi pack plus the missing 3 individual ink cartridges works out far more expensive. Will probably shop around for a better deal in future.

The service I received from your salesman was excellent, he not only found the product I required but also checked it did suit the type of battery to be used in the camera, pleasant manner, very helpful and the goods arrived the next day as promised. I save 5stars for my next purchase! .

The tripod itself is good, lightweight and easy to transport. Would suit well an amateur or beginner photographer who doesn't want to spend fortunes on their first tripod. The finishes of the plastic tripod head are a bit rough, but it does the job.  I was particular happy with the service provided by WexPhotographic. The standard delivery was extremely quick, I received mine the next working day. However the tripod came faulty, so I had to return in exchange for a new one. Customer services was prompt in response, and I was sent a prepaid return postage label. Got my new and properly working tripod very soon after that. Thanks for the no-fuss service!

I pre-ordered a camera with an 'offer' pack that came free. There was no hurry but when I found the camera was being sold [ie; in stock] and asked why my order had not been despatched?  When I called staff were very helpful and split the order so that I could get used to using the camera and the 'offer pack' was sent some time later. Within that pack an item was an issue, 'Adobe Cloud Membership', and I've effectively been left to sort the problem out with Canon. I appreciate that items within a 'pack' may not directly be the responsibility of Wex but I do feel a bit let down. Other outlets were offering the same deal but I stuck to Wex as I've had previous good experience but this may change that loyalty. I think that Wex is a good company but on this occasion they could have done better

Review Headline: Slight glitch on ordering but ok in the end, I hope.
Review Comments: Slight glitch on ordering but ok in the end, I hope.

The website was easy to use, found what I wanted quickly and purchasing was a breeze. The camera itself is fantastic and couldn't be happier with my purchase. The only reason I gave four and not five stars was due to the execution of the fraud system that I experienced. I placed my order Thursday night and payed for Saturday delivery, I then received an email late Friday morning asking to provide a photo of my driving license or passport, now this email asked for no more details and the only time frame it mentioned was to send back before 7 days, Iuckily I was at home and was able to quickly send a proof of ID, I called to confirm if I would still receive my order by Saturday, I was told that I would if I could also send a proof of address before 18:30 closing. I could not believe this and was just grateful I was at home otherwise I would not have been able to provide what they asked in time and therefore not receiving my order on the day I had paid for it to be delivered. I don't mean to rant but this was inconvenient, I'm not saying to not have safety checks/fraud prevention in place but to reevaluate the current system.

Review Headline: SHOPPING WITH WEX IS GENERALLY VERY GOOD.
Review Comments: SHOPPING WITH WEX IS GENERALLY VERY GOOD. I give it 4 stars because there are certain technical details with products that it would be helpful if they were included. For example, I have purchased the Atomos Coiled Full HDMI to Full HDMI Cable (30-45cm) there is no information on the website as to the capacity of this cable when working with the ninja v. Will this cable be able to transmit 4k 120fps? What is the difference between this and the much more expensive at £59!! per cable Atomos Pro flex Full HDMI 2.0 cable? This causes doubts and confusion when shopping. Some kind of comparison with specs would be helpful to guide shoppers to the right solution for them. WEX I think gives a really good service, but this would make it better. Thank you.

Review Comments: Delivery drivers, first attempt to deliver, he could not locate my address, as I had paid for next day I am not impressed as I didn't received my parcel on time. Contacted Amazon via Online then your return phone call. I was asked for any information that could help the driver locate me, explained that my block of flats are at the very end of the Cul de Sac and gave you my permission to give driver my mobile number. The next day I received a call from your driver, he was in my road but still unable to find my block of flats. Talking to him on the phone, he could not understand ENGLISH, so in the end I had to rush outside and up the road to find him, he had not driven or walked to the very end of the road, where in fact their is a large Sign with the Block of Flats Name on it. I am not impressed with your choice of employee, as he seemed unable to understand simple instructions. I would appreciate a reply at your earliest convenience.

Review Headline: Slight confusion with promotional code, but otherwise OK
Review Comments: Slight confusion with promotional code, but otherwise OK

In fairness to WEX the order was complicated, involving P/EX, cashback and purchasing of a combination of secondhand lenses, a new camera and accessories so there was a crossover between the departments.   The staff were at all times very helpful during the process.  The delivery should have arrived on Saturday but eventually arrived on Monday. I anticipated this as I had ordered during the madness of Black Friday and Parcel Force were stretched. Initially it would have been a problem but I had cancelled what I was planning and didn't need the equipment urgently.  When the delivery came, one of the lens boxes was empty. I immediately telephoned and assistance was given.  The lens should arrive tomorrow, Thursday. The person on the phone who informed of this was apologetic and very polite.  I have used WEX in the past and would do so again. In this instance I feel that it would almost have been better to have driven to Norwich due, as stated, to the complexity involved.  I have slight reservations around online ordering of high cost items but that is not a WEX issue.  I hope the lens arrives and am waiting for a credit to be issued as per agreement with WEX.

Review Headline: Would have been a quick delivery but for the deliverer!
Review Comments: Parcel Force responded positively to my request to collect at Post Office, but subsequently messaged to say they were delivering late afternoon.  They later messaged to say delivering 10-11 when I was at work.  I then had a message to say attempted delivery and to collect from Wellesborne POst Office which is 12 miles from my house and 21 miles from my place of work.  Our nearest Post Offices are 3 miles away.  I drove all the way there, got stuck on the A46 due to traffic jams, found that parcel force hadn't been there that day.  I called Parcel Force complaints and discovered that the camera kit had actually been delivered to my local Post Office.  I then got stuck in more traffic before (nearly 2 hours later) arriving at Budbrooke Post Office to collect my camera.  Other than that, the service and product great!!

Review Headline: Great service, shame about the product.
Review Comments: Web site has a good array of products and is easy to navigate. The ordering process was easy and the delivery was fast and efficient. I would use Wex again.  However, I was rather disappointed by the product, the Vanguard Alta Pro 263AGH tripod with pistol grip head. The tripod legs are good and sturdy with some very useful features but the head is definitely not in the same league. I wish I had bought a different version. Even with the friction adjusted at max. the grip is still quite movable and does not instil trust, the main point of a tripod is to hold everything solidly. The movement of the head is not what I would call fluid and can be tricky to position delicately. My low-end Vanguard ball head is far more efficient and effective and requires very little effort to lock solidly. The trigger requires significant pressure and my wife has difficulty operating it. Also the grip re-positioning mechanism is unnecessarily stiff and needs two hands to operate or the whole head moves due to the inefficiencies of the ball head, it does not need to be like this as there is a locking collar to prevent movement under normal operation. Overall, I am very disappointed by the head which has some design problems, especially under load and I am only using it at less than half the rated capability! This was a poor purchase on my part and is to be avoided.

Brill

In fairness to WEX the order was complicated, involving P/EX, cashback and purchasing of a combination of secondhand lenses, a new camera and accessories so there was a crossover between the departments.   The staff were at all times very helpful during the process.  The delivery should have arrived on Saturday but eventually arrived on Monday. I anticipated this as I had ordered during the madness of Black Friday and Parcel Force were stretched. Initially it would have been a problem but I had cancelled what I was planning and didn't need the equipment urgently.  When the delivery came, one of the lens boxes was empty. I immediately telephoned and assistance was given.  The lens should arrive tomorrow, Thursday. The person on the phone who informed of this was apologetic and very polite.  I have used WEX in the past and would do so again. In this instance I feel that it would almost have been better to have driven to Norwich due, as stated, to the complexity involved.  I have slight reservations around online ordering of high cost items but that is not a WEX issue.  I hope the lens arrives and am waiting for a credit to be issued as per agreement with WEX.

Review Headline: Snap a computer bargain at Wex!
Review Comments: Great price on an Apple Thunderbolt 27 inch display. I only associated Wex with Cameras but this display was the best price I could find on the internet and from a reputable supplier. Its not a 5k display but it seems good value for the money for image processing photographs. I decided to replace my 2009 IMAC with this display driven from my 2015 Macbook Pro. The Macbook Pro has a retina display so well suited to this 27inch monitor and the USB 3 interface on the Macbook makes a significant difference to access to my half a Terabyte of RAW images on an external drive.  Note that the Apple Thunderbolt Display only has USB 2 ports - ok for most things but make sure your external USB 3 drive is plugged into the Computer USB ports (if that is USB 3). A good compromise compared to spending £1.9 - 2.3k on a new Imac with 5k display. Wex is only missing the last star for the delivery. The Apple box was in a larger packing box but not marked as Fragile and upon opening, the bubble packing was only protecting one side. The Delivery person moved the display from her van to the door by tipping it end over end down the drive. Not what you want to see happen to a £750 piece of sensitive electronic equipment. No damage is apparent but I await to see if any problems develop from poor delivery handling.

Review Headline: Great service when the delivery company screwed it
Review Comments: I really can't give more than three for the delivery service.  It's not their fault, but Parcel Force proved pretty much incapable if delivering the item.  They tried on two days but could not find the house (I live in a small village with one postcode for all of us, but zither couriers cope and Im actually not that hard to find.). Finally, they got it to me on the third day, after phoning. I'd paid for next day delivery and Wex refunded that; and the customer service guys were all over the problem, trying to get it sorted out - good communication, lots of sympathy and very understanding of my frustration with Parcel Force. I suspect my 'episode' was a one-off, so I wouldn't let this put you off, and the Wex customer service responds very effectively.  And everything else about Wex's service was very good.

Review Headline: I can see why they are a Which? recommended provider

Review Headline: Very good product but poor delivery experience
Review Comments: The seller is great, the delivery service poor. Delivery (Parcelforce) was attempted on a Friday, when I was out. Card left to say they'd re-deliver Monday. Unfortunately I was out again, but instead of leaving a card again and letting me know where I could pick it up, PF left the parcel in full view next to my front door, advertising to the world that I wasn't in. No card through the door to tell me even where it was. A signature is required for this service, and obviously the driver was too bored to do his job properly, as he didn't get one. I won't order from Wex again if this is going to happen.

Review Headline: Like a lot of people I suppose, l'll often look, and then...
Review Comments: Like a lot of people I suppose, l'll often look, and then perhaps buy, from someone like Amazon nowadays (although I probably wouldn't have done so for photographic stuff a few years ago). THEIR website in some ways IMO is better than Wex's as products are illustrated on it with plenty of HIGH-QUALITY Photos which can be zoomed into for example when needed to get a feel of the product. Given that cameras and lenses etc can be expensive, I feel it's important to be able to at least look properly at what one is going to buy when buying online. However, I have ordered a number of photographic items from Wex before (including lenses and a small digital compact camera and I've found your delivery and packaging etc and overall service good. For your info, I was possibly intending to buy this Fuji X100F camera + case from Amazon, however, within the last couple of days, I noticed that the price of this 'old' model had dropped or had been reduced on the Wex website, and the price of the camera's dedicated leather case was also being discounted when purchased with the camera - this swung it for me.

Service was excellent as usual.  I have shopped at Wex previously; their prices may be higher than some box shifters but are more or less the same as other quality photography outlets. Their web site is so easy to use, with reviews of equipment usually available as well as full descriptions.  It is easy to order using credit cards and delivery is usually very quick; and for a small extra cost you can get next day delivery.  For a recent order of mine, the next day delivery did not occur - the fault of the delivery firm, not Wex - but Wex refunded the cost of next day delivery without question

Paid for next day delivery. Checked on tracking, I knew it was on its way. By 5 o clock nothing! Checked tracking which said item was at local Post Office. I had no card left and I'd been home all day, so why was this? I had to go to the local PO and collect before 17:30, which I managed but could have done without!! Later that night a neighbour dropped the Parcelforce notification through the door. Driver had clearly gone to the wrong address. Not happy!!

Did not receive dispatch notification for two days expecting later delivery but then delivered one day early, effective first class and before tracking indicated. No issue with early delivery but I was unsure when to be in for the product which was eventually taken in by someone else on my behalf. Just seemed a tortuous process and slow notification at the beginning. Product and rest of service brilliant and delivery was probably a one off. Would buy again.
GOOD SWIFT

Review Headline: I am still trying to find the best setting for the handstrap
Review Comments: Good efficient process from purchase to delivery. Regarding the SpiderLight Hand Strap Instructions are basic but sufficient to allow connection of strap to camera; what is lacking is any form of advice on achieving the optimum setting for comfort and accessibility to all camera controls. As the strap is still new it has not yet moulded to my hand shape so I guess I will be tweaking it for a few months to come. Initially I am having to contort ny fingers for access to the shutter button and I have not quite found the best way to operate the video button on my Olympus OM-E M5 II. As of today I can only rate the strap **** perhaps, once the strap has settled in, I will feel happier to increase the rating.

Review Headline: Credit Customers Get a 2nd Class Service
Review Comments: I bought a Fuji X-T2 body, vertical grip and three batteries. The equipment is great. The purchasing experience wasn't.  I used the 12 months interest free credit system for my purchases. I was unable to complete the process online, as I couldn't see a way of paying a deposit. So that wasted time. I 'phoned customer services who were unable to deal with my needs and booked a telephone call with a finance representative for the next day. More time wasted. The deal was approved but could not be completed over the 'phone. Even more time wasted. Paperwork was sent out, signed and returned on a Saturday. I heard nothing so 'phoned on the next Tuesday to be told it hadn't been received. On the Wednesday I was advised it had been received and my purchases would be with me on Thursday. They finally arrived on the Friday - another day lost - and a week after starting the purchasing process. Surely, this process could be slicker?  So 5 stars for Fuji and 3 stars for WEX. I make that 4 stars in total.

Review Headline: I find this service fine, quick and easy.
Review Comments: I find this service fine, quick and easy.

Not a cheap option but sometimes quality is more important than price and Kirk do make very high quality products. With longer focal lengths it often isn't easy to stabilise the lens properly and even with good technique you get soft images using a good tripod and ballhead. Been there and done that in the past with a Pentax 67II and 200mm lens, before I'd heard of this kind of collar, I used to actually hang a small camera bag from the lens barrel and push my palm down on the camera prism. Kind of ungainly but it worked, and every image was pin sharp on Velvia 50 but I don't think I'd want to do that with this lens though!  The main thing to differentiate this from the cheap Chinese versions is the fact that the collar touches the lens in two places and not just one, which should make it much easier to get sharp images than with one of those versions or just using the lens on the camera with no collar. It seems much more stable already just putting it onto the tripod attached to the collar, rather than the camera body plate.
Prices need to be looked at. Most are good but the items I would like are too high.

Not a cheap option but sometimes quality is more important than price and Kirk do make very high quality products. With longer focal lengths it often isn't easy to stabilise the lens properly and even with good technique you get soft images using a good tripod and ballhead. Been there and done that in the past with a Pentax 67II and 200mm lens, before I'd heard of this kind of collar, I used to actually hang a small camera bag from the lens barrel and push my palm down on the camera prism. Kind of ungainly but it worked, and every image was pin sharp on Velvia 50 but I don't think I'd want to do that with this lens though!  The main thing to differentiate this from the cheap Chinese versions is the fact that the collar touches the lens in two places and not just one, which should make it much easier to get sharp images than with one of those versions or just using the lens on the camera with no collar. It seems much more stable already just putting it onto the tripod attached to the collar, rather than the camera body plate.

Review Headline: Buying from WEX is always straightforward and easy, howev...
Review Comments: Buying from WEX is always straightforward and easy, however, the part exchange process is badly in need of review as it's far too rigid, heavily loaded against the customer and bogged down in stupid rules. WEX refuse to provide an idea of the value of any kit to be traded in over the phone, and insist it's booked in and sent to them first. It can then take several days for the valuation to be carried out. Should they decide a repair needs carrying out, they often quote double the actual cost of what it should, which is laughable considering they own Fixation! The whole process seems to have been designed to cause maximum inconvenience to the customer and is too heavily loaded in their favour to be worthwhile.

Product was as expected. ordering from WEX was excellent, unfortunately tracked my parcel via Royal mail and watched it been loaded on van, only to be returned in van without even attempted delivery. Then watched it  over the weekend sat in the Royal Mail depot. Eventually got the product 5 days after dispatch from WEX. Admittedly 2 of those days were the weekend and my delivery was free. When It go delivered, driver told me that a lot of parcels go back to the depot because they are loaded with too many deliveries to do in one day. Not WEX fault and it was delivered within WEX 3-5 working days, but it's frustrating to see your parcel loaded on a van and you wait in all day thinking it will arrive, only to see it go back to the depot.

Review Headline: We got there in the end.
Review Comments: There were many issues during the complicated transaction, involving P/EX and a Supplier Promo bonus,  but all were dealt with in a prompt and friendly manner.  One of the items, a lens, was missing on delivery. The response was a prompt apology followed by an explanation and delivery of the item  The credit due was misquoted and slightly confusing. This was resolved by phone calls and online.  The order was placed on the weekend of Black Friday which was due to a specific need which was then cancelled and I would recommend, as would WEX, to try to avoid that time period. Deliveries, not totally under the control of WEX, cannot be guaranteed.

I bought this camera after reading many, many reviews reccommending it for street photography. I have to say I'm not dissapointed. A slight set back as the original one I recieved had dust on the sensor after the first day I took it out. I simply called up Wex and they sent me a pre-paid label, I returned it that day and recieved a new one the day after which has been superb. Highly recommend the camera and Wex for their impeccable customer service.

My item was a preorder so wasn't expecting it straight away although was told 2 weeks at the start took much longer to arrive.  When ordering there was no estimated delivery date and missed the chance of taking it on my holiday. Over all WEX did all they can to make sure my item was delivered asap. Would recommend to anyone wanting to use them for purchases. Just like to say if it's a preorder then it should state an estimated delivery . Thanks
